name: The Audriot Virtual Art Exhibition
description:
An interactive virtual art exhibition for the Audriot Gallery. Click to the left or right of the artwork to navigate.

A very short game made in 24 hours. It might be expanded upon in the future depending on what I plan to do next.

(Includes stock photos by Letizia Agosta, Rohit Tandon, and Sadeq Mousavi on Unsplash)
